description: Each account belongs to a customer. Join accounts.customer_id to customers.customer_id.
Each account is held at a branch. Join accounts.branch_id to branches.branch_id.
Each account has a type. Join accounts.account_type_id to account_types.account_type_id.
Each transaction is linked to an account. Join transactions.account_id to accounts.account_id.
Each loan is taken by a customer. Join loans.customer_id to customers.customer_id.
Each loan is associated with an account. Join loans.account_id to accounts.account_id.
Each loan has a type. Join loans.loan_type_id to loan_types.loan_type_id.
Each loan payment is for a loan. Join loan_payments.loan_id to loans.loan_id.
Each credit card is owned by a customer. Join credit_cards.customer_id to customers.customer_id.
Each credit card is linked to an account. Join credit_cards.account_id to accounts.account_id.
Each card transaction is made with a credit card. Join card_transactions.card_id to credit_cards.card_id.
Each ATM withdrawal is from an account. Join atm_withdrawals.account_id to accounts.account_id.
Each employee works at a branch. Join employees.branch_id to branches.branch_id.
